full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS RGYAL PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM GYI GTOR 'BUL, RNAM SRAS GTOR 'BUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES DAM CAN GSHIN RJE RGYAL PO PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM LA MCHOD GTOR RIM PA BSAM DON GRUB PA'I NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RIGS RUS PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING DAD PA STOBS DANG LDAN PA BKA' 'GYUR BA'I SRAS BU, DAD PA DANG STOBS DANG DPAL 'BYOR PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING GDONG BA'I RGYAN GYIS MDZES PA DPON PO RIN CHEN RGYA MTSOS 'DI LTA BU BSDUS @002B PA ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA SU MA TI MA nI PRA DZNY'AS SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: SU MA TI MA nI PRA DZNY'A,
